tool_sequence.query: IntelliJ IDEA Flutter run configuration xml format 2024 2025
IntelliJ IDEA run configuration "before launch" shell script XML method RunConfigurationTask
IntelliJ Flutter run configuration additionalArgs dart-define device ID XML

parameters.content:
<component name="ProjectRunConfigurationManager">
  <configuration default="false" name="OpenScheme - Integration Tests (Emulator)" type="FlutterTestConfigurationType" factoryName="Flutter Test">
    <option name="additionalArgs" value="--dart-define=USE_FIREBASE_EMULATOR=true" />
    <option name="filePath" value="$PROJECT_DIR$/apps/openscheme/integration_test" />
    <option name="testScope" value="DIRECTORY" />
    <method v="2">
      <option name="RunConfigurationTask" enabled="true" run_configuration_name="OpenScheme - Ensure Emulators" run_configuration_type="ShConfigurationType" />
    </method>
  </configuration>
</component>

<component name="ProjectRunConfigurationManager">
  <configuration default="false" name="OpenScheme - Start Emulators (Foreground)" type="ShConfigurationType">
    <option name="EXECUTE_SCRIPT_FILE" value="true" />
    <option name="INDEPENDENT_SCRIPT_PATH" value="true" />
    <option name="SCRIPT_PATH" value="$PROJECT_DIR$/apps/openscheme/scripts/start-emulators.sh" />
    <option name="INDEPENDENT_SCRIPT_WORKING_DIRECTORY" value="true" />
    <option name="SCRIPT_WORKING_DIRECTORY" value="$PROJECT_DIR$/apps/openscheme" />
    <option name="EXECUTE_IN_TERMINAL" value="true" />
    <method v="2" />
  </configuration>
</component>

parameters.command: xmllint --noout /Users/rayk/Projects/lucid-apps/.idea/runConfigurations/OpenScheme*.xml 2>&1 && echo "All XML files are well-formed"
